content.p: The Reading Room is open: Monday - Tuesday 9.30am - 5pm Wednesday - Thursday 9.30am - 6pm by appointment-only. Please give us as much notice of your visit in advance as possible, but at least a minimum of two working days. Material should be ordered in advance where possible. All material will need to be returned 15 minutes before closing. To make an an appointment, please email mss-library@nottingham.ac.uk Anyone is welcome to visit the Reading Room. If you wish to consult the archives or rare books, contact us in advance, to let us know the references of the material you want to see, and to make an appointment to view the material, which can then be made ready for you. On your first visit you will be asked to register as a reader by reading and signing this 'Regulations and Registration' form. For various reasons, access to some material may be restricted. Every effort will be made to give readers advance warning of such problems. Next page: Getting to the Reading Room Kings Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 4565 fax: +44 (0) 115 846 8651 email: mss-library@nottingham.ac.uk
